data.meta_description: Michael Kirk Douglas portrayed Hank Pym/Ant-Man in Ant-Man, Ant-Man and the Wasp, Avengers: Endgame and Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania. He also portrayed an alternate Hank Pym in Avengers: Endgame. He voiced an alternate Hank Pym/Yellowjacket in the What If...? episode What If... The World...
data.text:
Michael Kirk Douglas portrayed Hank Pym/Ant-Man in Ant-Man, Ant-Man and the Wasp, Avengers: Endgame and Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania.

He also portrayed an alternate Hank Pym in Avengers: Endgame.

He voiced an alternate Hank Pym/Yellowjacket in the What If...? episode What If... The World Lost Its Mightiest Heroes?.

He voiced an alternate Hank Pym/Ant-Man in the What If...? episode What If... Peter Quill Attacked Earth's Mightiest Heroes?.

Archive audio of Michael Douglas from Ant-Man and Ant-Man and the Wasp was used in the Loki episode For All Time. Always.

He was interviewed for the Assembled episode The Making of Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania.

Awards[]

He was nominated for a Saturn Award for Best Supporting Actor for his work on Ant-Man.

Trivia[]

Michael Douglas previously worked with Martin Donovan in The Sentinel.

Michael Douglas previously worked with Anthony Russo and Joe Russo in You, Me and Dupree.

Michael Douglas previously worked with Robert Downey, Jr. in Wonder Boys.

Michael Douglas previously worked with Josh Brolin in Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps.

Michael Douglas previously worked with Don Cheadle and John Slattery in Traffic.

Michael Douglas previously worked with Gwyneth Paltrow in A Perfect Murder.

Michael Douglas previously worked with Jeffery Wright in Green Eggs and Ham.

Michael Douglas previously worked with Bill Murray in Saturday Night Live 40th Anniversary Special.

Michael Douglas previously worked with Louis D'Esposito in Basic Instinct.

Michael Douglas shares his birthday with Donald Glover and T.I..

[]
